amendment.description: To provide a national energy policy for the United States of America.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1432 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1432 proposed by Senator Frist to the motion to commit . (consideration: CR S10251) To provide a national energy policy for the United States of America.
